about_the_game:
STU, the First AI is a 2.5D adventure mimicking the style and feel of Super Metroid. With exploration at its heart, you'll discover a vast digital world full of artificial life and humans struggling to control them. You will encounter many weapons, items, abilities, secrets, and even humans plugged into the digital world.

Playing as Bit, a self-aware artificial intelligence, you will fight through this vast digital world. Do the bidding of the powerful artificial intelligence, STU, or help humans in their fight for survival.

Features
- Prove your worth in the five large digital biomes, full of puzzles, secrets, enemies, characters, and bosses.
- Unlock abilities, explore, fight, solve puzzles, and uncover previously inaccessible areas in a Metroidvania style.
- Discover the 50+ human characters and go on many quests.
- Fight in real-time combat using the 20+ unique weapons, each with its strengths and weaknesses.
- Experience a story about finding humanity in artificial life, and AI's discovering emotion in this 20+ hours single-player adventure.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux and Steam Deck
  • Processor: 2,6 GHz Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960M

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: 2,6 GHz Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960M
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Runs on most laptops

name: STU, the First AI

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 @ 3.2 GHZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1050 GTX (Notebook)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Runs on most laptops

short_description: STU, the First AI is a Metroidvania set in the digital world of computers and the internet. Exploration is the heart of the game. Discover a vast world with new forms of digital life and humans struggling to control them.
